title: Rename first-level folders to Roman numerals
description:
Renamed 10 folders from Arabic (01-10) to Roman numerals (I.-X.) format:
- 01 Foundations → I. Foundations
- 02 Economics → II. Economics  
- 03 Markets and Institutions → III. Markets and Institutions
- 04 Fixed Income → IV. Fixed Income
- 05 Equities and Alternatives → V. Equities and Alternatives
- 06 Derivatives → VI. Derivatives
- 07 Corporate Finance → VII. Corporate Finance
- 08 Portfolio Management → VIII. Portfolio Management
- 09 Risk Management → IX. Risk Management
- 10 Quantitative Trading → X. Quantitative Trading

title: Reorganize FinanceCompendium into intuitive topic schema
description: Reorganize the FinanceCompendium repo so all learning materials live under numbered topical folders (01 Foundations ... 10 Quantitative Trading) with courses/textbooks kept as intact units, Graduate Microeconomics filed under Economics/Microeconomics, equities vs alternatives separated under 05, and logs/tooling moved under Z Infrastructure & Scripts.
acceptance_criteria: 1) Root contains only 01–10 topical folders, handoff.md, and Z Infrastructure & Scripts; 2) Course and textbook folders remain intact; 3) Graduate Microeconomics is under 02 Economics/Microeconomics; 4) Equities vs Alternatives split under 05 Equities and Alternatives; 5) Log folder nested under Z Infrastructure & Scripts/logs.
